author: Peter Gottgens
method: Mix all the marinade ingredients together in a large bowl. Peel the butternut and sweet potatoes, then slice in pieces no bigger than ½-¾cm/¼-½in thick.   Dice the remaining vegetables to the same size. Submerge all the vegetables in the marinade for 2 hours. Take the vegetables out of the marinade and remove any excess liquid. Place the griddle pan or frying pan on the hob and drizzle with a little olive oil, ensure the pan is hot. Place the vegetables in the pan and grill for 2-3 minutes.
ingredients: 1 butternut, peeled and sliced,  2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and sliced,  ¼ kabocha pumpkin, peeled and cubed,  2 green courgette, cubed,  2 yellow courgette, cubed,  1 large aubergine, cubed,  4 lemons, juice only,  50ml/2fl oz balsamic vinegar,  1 tsp ginger powder,  2 tbsp dark soy sauce,  olive oil,  50g/ 2oz fresh ginger, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
